T02D2110:148a-0: @148a ` // 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//
T02D2110:148b-0: @148b # // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2110:148b-1: sk'akya thub pas gsungs pa'i 'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'di la zab dang rgya che ba gnyis las /
T02D2110:148b-2: 'di rgya che ba'i man ngag go //
T02D2110:148b-3: don brgyad las 'di man ngag gi sa'o //
T02D2110:148b-4: de la rim gyis pa dang cig car ba las 'di rim gyis pa'i sa'o //
T02D2110:148b-5: de la bum pa'i dbang gi dus su //
T02D2110:148b-6: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
T02D2110:148b-8: sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon //
T02D2110:148b-10: de la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan te /
T02D2110:148b-11: smon 'jug gnyis kyis slob ma las la 'jug pa'i dus su /
T02D2110:148b-12: ri yi phug gam chu 'gram mam //
T02D2110:148b-13: lha khang mchod rten dben sa dang //
T02D2110:148b-14: dur khrod gnas dang shing drung du //
T02D2110:148b-15: de la sogs te gnas yid du 'ong bar /
T02D2110:148b-16: slob dpon stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2110:148b-17: bsam gtan la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2110:148b-19: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2110:148b-21: de nas rang 'jam dpal du bsgoms la //
T02D2110:148b-24: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2110:148b-28: w'a g'i shva ra ma h'a b'a tsa /
T02D2110:148b-30: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu
T02D2110:148b-31: dzny'a na garbha aa:zhes pas bdag dang snang srid stong
T02D2110:148b-32: bar bsam / de'i ngang las bdag gshin rje gshed du bsgoms la /
T02D2110:148b-33: sa snang ba la bslang ba dang //
T02D2110:148b-34: mi snang ba la bslang ba dang /
T02D2110:148b-37: mchod gtor gyis mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D2110:148b-40: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sta gon ni bdud rtsi'i chus chag chag btab la ;
T02D2110:148b-45: de nas lha dang bum pa'i sta gon bya ste /
T02D2110:148b-46: bum pa dkar po nag po ra ri spangs pa
T02D2110:148b-47: la ras cha tshar ma nyams pa'i mgul chings byas
T02D2110:148b-49: de la sogs pa'i yo byad rgyas par bso ba //
T02D2110:148b-50: de ni bum pa'i sta gon no //
T02D2110:148b-51: de nas rnal 'byor pa sta gon la gnas par bya ste /
T02D2110:148b-52: sbyir khrus dang ldan par bya /
T02D2110:148b-55: slob dpon 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2110:149a-2: slob ma'i sta gon ni phyir khrus byas la /
T02D2110:149a-5: bar chod bsrung ba'i phyir srung skud gdags pa dang /
T02D2110:149a-6: dpa' bo 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2110:149a-7: de ni slob ma'i sta gon no //
T02D2110:149a-8: bar der zhi ba'i sbyin srog rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2110:149a-9: dbang thob pa dang ma thob pa gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2110:149a-10: dbang thob na sems bskyed bya mi dgos //
T02D2110:149a-11: ma thob na sems bskyed bya /
T02D2110:149a-12: gnyis pa la 'jug gsum pa la rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2110:149a-13: de yang gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste /
T02D2110:149a-14: dbang thob pa yin na bum pa gcig la dbang bzhi stan thog tu bskur /
T02D2110:149a-15: byin rlabs brtan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon la yon dbul lo //
T02D2110:149a-16: de'i cho ga ni dang po kho nas sa bslang ste /
T02D2110:149a-17: sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2110:149a-18: sa yi dmigs dang ne'u gsing lu ma rnams //
T02D2110:149a-19: rdzing dang lteng ka so so'i gnas rnams nas //
T02D2110:149a-20: sa bdag klu gnyan sde dang 'khor du bcas //
T02D2110:149a-21: sa yi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2110:149a-22: gnas 'dir spyan 'dren mchog kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D2110:149a-23: dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi sa bslang phyir //
T02D2110:149a-24: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
T02D2110:149a-25: rin chen gser gyis gzhi bslang du gsol //
T02D2110:149a-26: lag pa g-yas pa sa la brdabs pas /
T02D2110:149a-27: sa gas pa'i ser gnas sa'i lha mo ro stod bsnyems te byung nas /
T02D2110:149a-28: lag pa g-yas pa khas len gyi phyag rgya /
T02D2110:149a-29: g-yon pa bum pa bsnams pa de ltar byon par bsam /
T02D2110:149a-30: de la gtor ma dang me tog dri zhim pos mchod la /
T02D2110:149a-31: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab ste /
T02D2110:149a-32: sngon bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas srod la bdud btul //
T02D2110:149a-33: tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang
T02D2110:149a-34: sa gzhi rin po che 'di'i steng du mdzad pa
T02D2110:149a-35: lags pas / rnal 'byor pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa yang /
T02D2110:149a-36: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rten 'jam dpal ye shes sems
T02D2110:149a-37: dpa'i pho brang 'debs par 'tshal bas sa'i lha mo
T02D2110:149a-38: 'khor dang bcas pas sa bdag klu gnyan kun /
T02D2110:149a-39: sa rin du rin po ches brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di ba zhes la /
T02D2110:149a-40: dang po dge sbyor dbu bzung ba nas /
T02D2110:149b-0: tha ma rdzogs pa mthar phyin dus gnas 'di bdag la @149b g-yar lags pas /
T02D2110:149b-1: sa 'di brtan pa dang bkra shis par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2110:149b-3: h'um skyob pa sangs rgyas rin po che //
T02D2110:149b-4: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2110:149b-5: lha mo 'khor bcas dpang du gyur //
T02D2110:149b-6: sh'akya thub pa skyob pa yis //
T02D2110:149b-7: bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar //
T02D2110:149b-8: de bzhin bdag gis bdud rnams gzhom //
T02D2110:149b-9: pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri /
T02D2110:149b-11: de nyid du thim par bsam mo //
T02D2110:149b-12: de ni sa bslang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2110:149b-13: de nas bdag nyid 'jam dpal du gsal bar bsgoms la /
T02D2110:149b-14: de nas rdo rje gsor dril bu gsil zhing /
T02D2110:149b-15: rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor zhing sa gzhi gzung ngo //
T02D2110:149b-16: de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad de /
T02D2110:149b-17: las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing sdang mig phyogs bcur blta /
T02D2110:149b-18: rdo rje nam mkha' la gsor zhing mtshams bcad do //
T02D2110:149b-19: de nas dri sna tshogs dang spos kyi chus sbyar la lag tu thogs la /
T02D2110:149b-20: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la 'di skad do //
T02D2110:149b-21: h'um bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D2110:149b-22: dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2110:149b-23: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2110:149b-24: dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2110:149b-25: de dag slob mar bcas pa dang //
T02D2110:149b-27: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi dri'i chus byug go //
T02D2110:149b-28: bdag gu thugs kar thig skud kyi sna gcig bzung /
T02D2110:149b-29: slob ma de phyag na rdo rjer gsal btab la /
T02D2110:149b-30: thig skud de lte ba'i khung du gzung la //
T02D2110:149b-31: h'um nam mkha' gang ba'i bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2110:149b-32: khyod kyis sems can 'gro don mdzad//
T02D2110:149b-33: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thig gdab po //
T02D2110:149b-34: thig skud kyi sgra yis bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs
T02D2110:149b-35: dam bskul nas sems can gyi don mdzad par bsam
T02D2110:149b-36: mo // da ni sa tshon gyis brlab ste /
T02D2110:149b-37: aom h'um sv'a hr'i h'a bris la rigs lnga'i dgug gzhug bya'o //
T02D2110:149b-38: de zhu bas rin po che lnga'i phye mar gyur nas /
T02D2110:149b-39: des bris te g-yon pas de nas padma'i gdan re dgod /
T02D2110:149b-40: de las lha'i 'phro 'du dang bskyed pa gzhan nas gsal lo //
T02D2110:149b-41: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
